text: Riverside-Thomas Cemetery is a historical cemetery located in Bingham County, Idaho. The cemetery was unofficially established by the first interment of James William Parsons who died on June 6, 1887. The cemetery has a capacity of 6,874 deceased persons. The Riverside-Thomas Cemetery District was officially established January 26, 1931. == Noted burials == *Jerry Thomas Twiggs, who served as Idaho Senate Pro Tem for a number of years, is buried at the cemetery == References == Category:Bingham County, Idaho Category:Cemeteries in Idaho
title: Riverside-Thomas Cemetery
